#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<string>
using namespace std;

/*int scan()
{
    int n=0;
    char ch=getc_unlocked(stdin);
    while (ch<'0'||ch>'9')
    {
        ch=getc_unlocked(stdin);
    }
    while (ch>='0'&&ch<='9')
    {
        n=n*10+ch-'0';
        ch=getc_unlocked(stdin);
    }

    return n;
}*/
int main()
{
   int n,q,i,j;
   cin>>n;
   long long int a[n+1];
   for(int k=1;k<=n;k++)
        cin>>a[k];
   for(int k=2;k<=n;k++)
       a[k]+=a[k-1];
        cin>>q;   
     while(q--)
    {
       cin>>i>>j;
     if(i==1)
     cout<<a[j]<<endl;
     else
     cout<<a[j]-a[i-1]<<endl;
    }
   
     return 0;
}
